select p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_stock, p.product_price, p.register_date , p.update_date , o.order_id , o.product_count , o.order_date , product_price * product_count as order_price from product p join "ORDER" o on p.product_id = o.product_id
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
ORDER BY order_price DESC
